bug.author: umesh-timalsina
bug.summary: Error Connecting to server when using HTTPS
bug.description: Example Logs, <denchmark-code>2020-01-22T23:30:53.318Z ctor { metadata: { server: 'dev.deepforge.org', serverPort: 443, httpsecure: true, logger: { debug: [Function: log], log: [Function: log], info: [Function: log], warn: [Function: log], error: [Function: err] } } } 2020-01-22T23:30:53.321Z Running under node or node-web-kit 2020-01-22T23:30:53.324Z origin https://dev.deepforge.org:443 2020-01-22T23:30:53.324Z blobUrl https://dev.deepforge.org:443/rest/blob/ 2020-01-22T23:30:53.325Z ctor { metadata: { server: 'dev.deepforge.org', serverPort: 443, httpsecure: true, logger: { debug: [Function: log], log: [Function: log], info: [Function: log], warn: [Function: log], error: [Function: err] } } } 2020-01-22T23:30:53.325Z Running under node 2020-01-22T23:30:53.325Z origin https://dev.deepforge.org:443 2020-01-22T23:30:53.325Z executorUrl https://dev.deepforge.org:443/rest/executor/ 2020-01-22T23:30:53.325Z Connecting to https://dev.deepforge.org 2020-01-22T23:30:53.365Z Error connecting to https://dev.deepforge.org Error: Unauthorized </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: It might be nice to specify that this is for the workers (not from the browser)
